The 'Source Browser' Options Panel

The 'Source Browser' Options panel allows you to:

  1. Select where the Source Browser should be displayed: docked on the top, left, bottom, or right of the main RText window, or in a floating window of its own.
  2. Specify the location of the Exhuberant CTags executable on your system. This option MUST be specified for the Source Browser to parse your source files. If it is empty or incorrect, the Source Browser will not display anything.

See also: The Options Dialog
